title: Why can't my RIOT Tristana code work?
body: It always says 'This code does not appear to be valid'. Anyone know? WHY?!

replies.body:
Hey TheLoricBorn!

Sorry to hear about the Tristana redemption page on Facebook :(

The best way to get this resolved ASAP is to submit a new ticket to Player Support, which you can do here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

We should be able to get this fixed-up for you in no-time!  :)
It may have something to do with your facebook privacy settings (search it on youtube) You could always ask support :) Sorry if it doesn't help. Just search it on Youtube...
